effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Rock Tomb to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II & I: Swift)
effect_entries.effect: Teaches Rock Tomb to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
岩石を　投げつけて　攻撃する。
相手の　動きを　封じることで
素早さを　さげる。

Boulders are hurled at the target.
This also lowers the target’s Speed
stat by preventing its movement.

Colpisce il nemico con rocce. Inoltre, lo rallenta
riducendone la Velocità.

El usuario ataca al objetivo arrojando el objeto
que lleve. La potencia y los efectos dependen
del objeto arrojado.

Das Ziel wird mit Felsen beworfen.
Senkt den Initiative-Wert des Zieles.

Des rochers frappent l’ennemi.
Réduit aussi sa Vitesse en l’empêchant de se
déplacer.

암석을 내던져서 공격한다.
상대의 움직임을 봉인함으로써
스피드를 떨어뜨린다.

いわを　なげつけ　こうげきする。
おちた　いわが　うごきを　ふうじて
あいての　すばやさを　さげる。

Boulders are hurled at the target. It
also lowers the target’s Speed by
preventing its movement.

Boulders are hurled at the target. It
also lowers the target’s Speed by
preventing its movement.

Des rochers frappent l’ennemi. Réduit
aussi sa Vitesse en l’empêchant de
se déplacer.

Large boulders are hurled at the foe
to inflict damage. It lowers the foe’s
Speed.

Large boulders are hurled at the foe
to inflict damage. It lowers the foe’s
Speed.

Large boulders are hurled at the foe
to inflict damage. It may also make the
target flinch.

Boulders are hurled
at the foe. It also
lowers the foe’s
SPEED if it hits.

Stops the foe from
moving with rocks.
May lower SPEED.

Stops the foe from
moving with rocks.
May lower SPEED.
